query.title: Query
query.description: Sumo Logic query string for the search job. You may need to escape certain characters. See search query syntax document here

from_time.title: From Time
from_time.description: UTC date and time in the format 2021-11-10T11:30:00. Any data before this date will not be replicated. Leave empty if you want to pull from the very start.

by_receipt_time.title: By Receipt Time
by_receipt_time.description: Query logs by receipt time instead of message, default is using message time.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: This row size limit used for pagination. Higher value requires more memory.
